title: Cricket World Cup: Why India's pace attack is its strength
description: Many see the World Cup as a battle between pace attacks. In that case, India hold their own comfortably.
content:
When India first won the cricket World Cup in 1983, its bowlers were mainly all-rounders.

title: Cricket World Cup 2023: India's highs and lows in World Cup cricket

content:

title: Six dead and 15 trapped in Zimbabwe gold mine collapse

content:
Six people have died and 15 others are trapped, after a mine shaft collapsed in Zimbabwe, state media report.
